VI.iii.3.B.1.e
.
Deciding When a Field Examination Is Warranted
Request a field examination
only
if there is still doubt as to how to decide the case after reviewing all the available evidence from both claimants.
In any request for a field examination, show the
sources consulted, and
efforts made, as reported by the claimant.
